title: Apizza Scholls 2019 Update
recipe:
This updated 2019 recipe for Apizza Scholls pizza differs from the 2011 version. Preferment percentages:
21% of recipe flour
26% of recipe water
25.5% of recipe yeast.

Recommended flour for preferment is Central Milling Keith's Best
Recommended flour for final dough is Central Milling Artisan
If recommended flours are unavailable, use bread flour such as General Mills Better for Bread or King Arthur Bread Flour.

Method:

Mix poolish and allow to ferment at 75F for 14 hours. Mix fermented poolish and remaining flour, water, yeast and salt for 8 minutes on low speed.
Bulk for 3 hours and 45 minutes with 4 stretch and folds every 45 minutes.
Scale, ball and let rest for 2 hours in 75 degree environment.

Always keep mass effect in mind when doing small batches. Increase ambient temperature or yeast to compensate.

You can download a recipe which automatically calculates the preferment and final dough quantities here: https://cezanne.asuscomm.com/index.php/s/gEzkg3mtnTbrSbF
